text:
we're back! join us for a riveting conversation as we kickstart the second season of blinkit pitstop. for our first episode, albinder dhindsa, founder of blinkit, welcomed yushika jolly and siddharth raguvanshi to talk about how to not just disrupt a category, but also create a whole new one. they've carved a niche for themselves with their semi-permanent hair colours that particularly resonate with millennials today.
